3873.verse: إِذْ|When|57|70|1198$قَالَ|he said|67|93|309$لِأَبِيهِ|to his father|102|128|5737$وَقَوْمِهِۦ|and his people,|120|146|11823$مَاذَا|`What is it|92|118|271$تَعْبُدُونَ|you worship?|106|119|1216$

3874.verse: أَئِفْكًا|Is it falsehood -|126|149|14655$ءَالِهَةً|gods|72|118|5479$دُونَ|other than|90|136|4462$ٱللَّهِ|Allah -|63|109|606$تُرِيدُونَ|(that) you desire?|140|163|1008$

3875.verse: فَمَا|Then what|91|125|132$ظَنُّكُم|(do) you think|114|183|14656$بِرَبِّ|about (the) Lord|130|199|6704$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds?`|134|168|8$

3881.verse: فَرَاغَ|Then he turned|122|162|14662$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|169|22$ضَرْبَۢا|striking|78|157|14665$بِٱلْيَمِينِ|with his right hand.|148|188|14666$

3885.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|114|101$ٱبْنُواْ|`Build|64|114|10686$لَهُۥ|for him|65|115|977$بُنْيَـٰنًا|a structure|94|144|10687$فَأَلْقُوهُ|and throw him|114|164|9253$فِى|into|48|73|89$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|the blazing Fire.`|134|134|1107$

3886.verse: فَأَرَادُواْ|And they intended|142|162|14670$بِهِۦ|for him|65|105|204$كَيْدًا|a plot,|63|103|8808$فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ|but We made them|146|186|11853$ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ|the lowest.|98|118|14671$

3889.verse: فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ|So We gave him the glad tidings|234|300|14673$بِغُلَـٰمٍ|of a boy|75|208|9797$حَلِيمٍ|forbearing.|91|157|14674$

3890.verse: فَلَمَّا|Then when|93|100|141$بَلَغَ|he reached|94|109|5476$مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ|the (age of) working with him|216|231|14675$قَالَ|he said,|72|87|309$يَـٰبُنَىَّ|`O my son!|95|110|8499$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|88|312$أَرَىٰ|have seen|88|102|7307$فِى|in|48|75|89$ٱلْمَنَامِ|the dream|87|114|14676$أَنِّىٓ|that I am|82|109|2879$أَذْبَحُكَ|sacrificing you,|120|147|14677$فَٱنظُرْ|so look|79|106|2332$مَاذَا|what|58|72|271$تَرَىٰ‌ۚ|you consider.`|117|132|5175$قَالَ|He said,|73|102|309$يَـٰٓأَبَتِ|`O my father!|112|141|8800$ٱفْعَلْ|Do|65|94|14678$مَا|what|53|82|262$تُؤْمَرُ‌ۖ|you are commanded.|158|173|9858$سَتَجِدُنِىٓ|You will find me,|128|153|10908$إِن|if|44|94|225$شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah wills,|99|149|180$مِنَ|of|50|100|156$ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ|the patient ones.`|143|168|1354$

3865.verse: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

3866.verse: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

3868.verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

3869.verse: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

3871.verse: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

3872.verse: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

3873.verse: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?

3874.verse: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?

3875.verse: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

3876.verse: And he cast a look at the stars

3877.verse: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

3878.verse: So they turned away from him, departing.

3879.verse: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

3880.verse: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"

3881.verse: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

3882.verse: Then the people came toward him, hastening.

3883.verse: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

3884.verse: While Allah created you and that which you do?"

3885.verse: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

3886.verse: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.

3887.verse: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

3888.verse: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

3889.verse: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

3890.verse: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."
